name: DebuggingInformationOverlay
shortDescription: Show Apple's UIDebuggingInformationOverlay on any app!
author: sst1337

users.issues: out of the box, doesn't work at all. However, using this app as inspiration, I set out to research the debugging overlay for iOS 11+...with patience and some fairly complex code (mainly due to having to inline several dozen lines of assembly), I had success. When I finally have time, I'll publish my methodology for anyone who is interested.
